name: MSSG.ME Widget
author: MSSG.ME INC.

sections.description:
The widget of a new era, it was never so easy to reach you in a messenger from the website.

mssg.me allows you to create a page with messengers for fast communication, and our Inbox allows you to receive messages from all instant messengers in one place.

Why it is better than live chat?

Usability
The client should not be on the website and wait for your answer.

Conversion
Communication with a real person in messenger increases purchase probability on more than 50%.

Promote in messengers
Stay in touch with the client and make promotions in messengers.

Usage

After enabling the plugin, head on to the widget customization page to change settings and integrate its look and feel to match your site. When done, enable it by visiting the account configuration page and completing the instant signup process.
sections.installation:
Server Requirements: PHP4 or PHP5.

WordPress versions: WordPress 2.7 and up.

Note: You will need a free mssg.me account: Get started for free!.

Step-by-step Guide:

  • Install plugin from WordPress directory and activate it.
  • Under settings section, click on MSSG.ME Widget to add your Widget embed code
  • Customize the widget to your preference.
  • You’re ready to go!
sections.faq:
How to create mssg.me page with messengers?

  • Click the button Get started on mssg.me website
  • Fill in all the fields (email, name, page name, password)
  • Read and agree with our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
  • Click on the button Continue

How to set up widget?

  • Sign in your personal profile
  • Click on the button Page â€“ Choose a section Widget
  • Choose color
  • Choose position
  • Add description
  • Choose device categories on which you want to show the widget
  • Copy embed code
  • Paste your widget code in plugin setting of your WordPress website

How much is widget costs?

MSSG.ME Widget is totally free.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Feature: Add the MSSG.ME Widget widget to your site.
  • Feature: Customize look and feel of the widget, including themes and color.
  • Feature: Get and manage messages from all messengers from widget in Inbox.
